Services

Product engineering for commerce that scales

What I Offer

I build and optimise Shopify systems for established and high-growth brands. Whether you need theme enhancements, custom sections, performance audits, or full-scale architecture decisions, I deliver solutions designed for long-term growth—not short-term fixes.

Core Services

Scalable Architecture

Building systems designed for growth. Architecture decisions that support long-term extensibility and maintainability, not short-term fixes. Custom Liquid sections, metafields, and schema-driven content that evolves with your business.

Performance-Led Development

Frontend development focused on Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse scores, and delivering fast, responsive experiences that convert. Performance audits, optimisation, and mobile-first implementations.

Product Engineering

Engineering at the intersection of product thinking and technical implementation. Solutions that balance commercial requirements with technical clarity—custom sections, app integrations, and UX refinements.

Commerce Platform Solutions

Specialising in Shopify 2.0 themes, custom integrations, and system design for established and high-growth brands. REST APIs, GraphQL, third-party apps, and theme customisation.

How I Work

Clear process from discovery to launch. No surprises, no scope creep.

1

Discovery

Understand your goals, constraints, and technical requirements. Align on scope, timeline, and deliverables.

2

Build

Develop with clear ownership and regular check-ins. Architecture-first thinking, performance built in from the start.

3

Launch

Handover with documentation and support. Systems built to evolve—not just launch—with maintainable code you can extend.

Ready to build?

Available for contract and consultancy work with product teams, agencies, and growth-stage brands.
